result.markdown:
--- title: "Mental Health" editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- The following questions were asked in regards to students feelings about their mental health. This includes if they have experienced any increased mental stress, if they have sought out services to help them, and how often they have felt certain types of mental stress over the past two weeks. ## Mental Health Feelings **Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?** ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Mental_Health_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){fig-align='center' width=672} ::: ::: **Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?** ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Mental_Health_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){fig-align='center' width=672} ::: ::: **Which statement best describes how you are feeling right now? (n=263, 12% of 2110 reporting)** ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Mental_Health_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){fig-align='center' width=576} ::: ::: Of the 263 students, 205 reported feeling safe while 57 reported having suicidal thoughts, but were not planning on hurting themselves. ## Mental Health Services **Do you have access to mental health services on your campus? (n=1829, 87% of 2110 reporting)** ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Mental_Health_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){fig-align='center' width=576} ::: ::: Of the 1829 students, the majority (1246) said yes to having access to on campus mental health services. Roughly one fourth of students were unsure, and a smaller minority stated they did not have access to on campus mental health services. **Have you used any of these campus-based mental health services within the last 12 months?** ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Mental_Health_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){fig-align='center' width=576} ::: ::: The vast majority of students (1065) responded "No" to using any of the on campus based mental health services within the last 12 months. Only 165 reported using the mental health service offered by their campus in the last 12 months. ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Measure Yes (%)
Counseling (one-on-one) (n = 163) 141 (86.5%)
Counseling (drop-in) (n = 163) 26 (16.0%)
Other support services (n = 163) 15 (9.2%)
Counseling (group) (n = 163) 12 (7.4%)
````` ::: ::: **Based on your experiences with one-on-one counseling, please respond to the following statements:** ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Mental_Health_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){fig-align='center' width=672} ::: ::: **What best describes your reason(s) for not using campus-based mental health services?** ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Measure Yes (%)
I haven't needed these services (n = 1000) 524 (52.4%)
I find support in other places (n = 1000) 180 (18.0%)
I don't know how to access these services (n = 1000) 172 (17.2%)
I don't know what services are available (n = 1000) 137 (13.7%)
I'm not sure how to pay for these services or if my insurance covers it (n = 1000) 135 (13.5%)
I have mental health support off campus (n = 1000) 135 (13.5%)
I am embarrassed to say I need help (n = 1000) 104 (10.4%)
I had trouble finding the location or getting contact information for these services (n = 1000) 89 (8.9%)
I don't think these services will help (n = 1000) 56 (5.6%)
I couldn't get an appointment (n = 1000) 38 (3.8%)
I cannot afford these services (n = 1000) 37 (3.7%)
I was afraid others would find out I was seeking help (n = 1000) 33 (3.3%)
I don't believe in therapy (n = 1000) 16 (1.6%)
````` ::: ::: **What statement(s) best describe why you might feel unsure about your ability to access mental health services on campus?** ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Measure Yes (%)
I'm not sure what these kinds of services are (n = 539) 304 (56.4%)
I don't know what services are available (n = 539) 273 (50.6%)
I haven't needed these services, so I haven't looked into them (n = 539) 202 (37.5%)
I don't know where to find information about them, so I'm not sure about what they are (n = 539) 180 (33.4%)
I haven't heard anyone talking about these services (n = 539) 141 (26.2%)
I don't believe in therapy, so I haven't looked into them (n = 539) 17 (3.2%)
````` ::: :::
